## SessionStorage.set() method

Puts current session value into the session storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(sessionValue: T): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sessionValue | <code>T</code> | value to put |
